title: If you press play without first checking poppy's new kit and the patch notes
body:
Then you deserve to lose

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-524-notes

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YkTdUaqFarc

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gsOSyoYD0Gs

At least skim it over before you spew do something stupid
